title: Mexican chocolate brownies
ingredients: ['340g unsalted butter', '600g caster sugar', '6 eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '125g unsweetened cocoa powder', '200g plain flour', '1 3/4 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper or to taste', '3/4 teaspoon sea salt', '3/4 teaspoon baking powder']
